name: sharp-beak
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Flying moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Flying-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
